my-work-description: Technology work involves creating, supporting, and using digital tools, systems, and applications (like AI, software, cloud, cybersecurity, data science) to boost efficiency, enable remote/hybrid work, and solve problems across nearly every industry, offering high demand, varied roles (from coding to analysis), and significant growth, with skills often valued over traditional degrees, making paths like bootcamps viable.
proffesional-description: Result-oriented Fullstack Developer & Architect with 4+ years of experience, specialized in interactive 3D web experiences and game development. Proven track record of managing cloud infrastructure (AWS/Digital Ocean) and deploying scalable SaaS applications serving 5,000+ users.
